column5: Hello - looking for someplace in quebec or maybe ontario for a good pike (some 40" fish) and walleye trip. Any thoughts? thanks for any help!
Look at Melchett Lake out of Nakina Ontario or Brace Lake also out of Nakina. Both have web sites but don't have them available.
I would give Air Tamarac a try in the Gouin Reserviour. Good pike and lots of walleye. Camps and accommodations are awesome. Check their website.
